trans-unit.source: Defines constants for supported well-known authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Define constantes para métodos de autenticação conhecidos com suporte.

trans-unit.source: Defines constants for SAML authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Define constantes para métodos de autenticação SAML.

trans-unit.source: These constants define URIs for well-known authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Essas constantes definem URIs para os métodos de autenticação conhecida.

trans-unit.source: These authentication methods map to well-known SAML authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos de autenticação são mapeados para métodos de autenticação SAML bem conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using a hardware token, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/hardwaretoken.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação usando um token de hardware, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/hardwaretoken.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using the Kerberos protocol, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/kerberos.
trans-unit.target: A autenticação usando o protocolo Kerberos, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/kerberos.

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the well-known authentication methods, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/.
trans-unit.target: O namespace dos métodos de autenticação conhecidos, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using a key authenticated by a PGP web of trust, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/pgp.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação usando uma chave autenticada por um PGP Web de confiança, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/pgp.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using the Secure Remote Password protocol, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/secureremotepassword.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação usando o protocolo Secure Remote Password, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/secureremotepassword.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using an XML digital signature, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/signature.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação usando uma assinatura digital XML, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/signature.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using a smartcard PKI, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/smartcardpki.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação usando uma PKI de cartão inteligente, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/smartcardpki.

trans-unit.source: Authentication on a key authenticated using an SPKI PKI, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/spki.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação em uma chave autenticada usando uma PKI SPKI, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/spki.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using either the SSL or TLS protocol with certificate-based client authentication, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/tlsclient.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação usando o protocolo SSL ou TLS com autenticação de cliente baseada em certificado, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/tlsclient.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using an unspecified method, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/unspecified.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação usando um método não especificado, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/unspecified.

trans-unit.source: Authentication on a key authenticated using an X.509 PKI, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/x509.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação em uma chave autenticada usando uma PKI X.509, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/x509.

trans-unit.source: Authentication on a key authenticated using an XKMS trust service, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/xkms.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação em uma chave autenticada usando um serviço de confiança XKMS, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/xkms.
